Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.rest.resource

Class BaseResource

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.rest.resource.BaseResource
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClusterResource, ClustersResource, DomainResource, DomainsResource, ScaleClusterResource, SwaggerResource, VersionResource, VersionsResource
public class BaseResource
extends java.lang.Object
BaseResource is the base resource of all the WebLogic operator's REST resources. It provides a number of common utilities that they use.
